snippet.title: Idle Tower Builder
snippet.description:
New incremental game by Airapport!
You can play the game everywhere!

On mobile
App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/idle-tower-builder/id1527621990
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.airapport.idletowerbuilder

On PC
Itch: https://airapport.itch.io/idle-tower-builder

On Web
Poki: https://poki.com/en/g/babel-tower (Rating 4.5/5 after 2k votes)
CrazyGames: https://www.crazygames.com/game/babel-tower (Rating 9.0/10 after 3.5k votes)
Kongregate: https://www.kongregate.com/games/generalvimes/babel-tower (Rating 3.34/5 after 1700 votes)
ArmorGames: https://armorgames.com/play/18964/babel-tower (Rating 75/100 after 700 votes)

The web version was released under the name "Babel Tower". But the the mobile release "Idle Tower Builder" seems better (you still will be building Babel Tower in fact ;) )
